sentences: John Lindberg (born March 16, 1959) in  is an American jazz double-bassist.
Lindberg began his professional career at the age of 16, eventually moving to New York City in 1977.
In 1977, with James Emery and Billy Bang, Lindberg co-founded the String Trio of New York.
In 1980 he formed a trio with Jimmy Lyons and Sunny Murray.
From 1980 to 1983 he lived in Paris, playing there solo and with Murray and John Tchicai.
